    • Constructor Detail

      • MongockBuilder

        public MongockBuilder(MongoClient mongoClient,
                      java.lang.String databaseName,
                      java.lang.String changeLogsScanPackage)

        Builder constructor takes db.mongodb.MongoClient, database name and changelog scan package as parameters.

        For more details about MongoClient please see com.mongodb.MongoClient docs

        Parameters:
        mongoClient - database connection client
        databaseName - database name
        changeLogsScanPackage - package path where the changelogs are located
        See Also:
        MongoClient

    • Method Detail

      • setChangeLogCollectionName

        public MongockBuilder setChangeLogCollectionName(java.lang.String changeLogCollectionName)

        Changes the changelog collection name

        Be careful as changing the changelog collection name can make Mongock to undesirably run twice the same changelog

        Parameters:
        changeLogCollectionName - name of the collection
        Returns:
        Mongock builder

      • setLockCollectionName

        public MongockBuilder setLockCollectionName(java.lang.String lockCollectionName)

        Changes the lock collection name

        Be careful as changing the lock collection name can make Mongock to run twice the same changelog and other undesirable scenarios

        Parameters:
        lockCollectionName - name of the collection
        Returns:
        Mongock builder

        Sets pre-configured MongoTemplate instance to use by the changelogs

        Returns:
        Mongock builder

      • setThrowExceptionIfCannotObtainLock

        public MongockBuilder setThrowExceptionIfCannotObtainLock(boolean throwExceptionIfCannotObtainLock)
        Feature which enables/disables throwing MongockException if the lock cannot be obtained
        Parameters:
        throwExceptionIfCannotObtainLock - Mongock will throw MongockException if lock can not be obtained
        Returns:
        Mongock builder

      • setEnabled

        public MongockBuilder setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Feature which enables/disables execution
        Parameters:
        enabled - Migration process will run only if this option is set to true
        Returns:
        Mongock builder

      • setSpringEnvironment

        public MongockBuilder setSpringEnvironment(Environment springEnvironment)
        Set Environment object for Spring Profiles (@Profile) integration
        Parameters:
        springEnvironment - org.springframework.core.env.Environment object to inject
        Returns:
        Mongock builder
        See Also:
        org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile

      • setLockConfig

        public MongockBuilder setLockConfig(long lockAcquiredForMinutes,
                                    long maxWaitingForLockMinutes,
                                    int maxTries)
        Set up the lock with minimal configuration. This implies Mongock will throw an exception if cannot obtains the lock.
        Parameters:
        lockAcquiredForMinutes - Acquired time in minutes
        maxWaitingForLockMinutes - max time in minutes to wait for the lock in each try.
        maxTries - number of tries
        Returns:
        Mongock object for fluent interface

      • setLockQuickConfig

        public MongockBuilder setLockQuickConfig()
        Set up the lock with default configuration to wait for it and through an exception when cannot obtain it.
        Returns:
        Mongock object for fluent interface

        public Mongock build()
